mapper.insert: insert into stadium( MEM_NO, STADIUM_NAME, STADIUM_ADDRESS, STADIUM_ZIPCODE, STADIUM_SCORE, STADIUM_PRICE, STADIUM_CATEGORY, STADIUM_START_TIME, STADIUM_END_TIME )values( #{memNo}, #{stadiumName}, #{stadiumAdd}, #{stadiumZipcode}, #{stadiumScore}, #{stadiumPrice}, #{stadiumCategory}, #{stadiumStartTime}, #{stadiumEndTime} )

insert into stadium_am(
STADIUM_NO,
TOILET,
SHOWER,
SMOKE,
PARK,
DRINK
)values(
#{stadiumNo},
#{toilet},
#{shower},
#{smoke},
#{park},
#{drink}
)

insert into stadium_rental(
STADIUM_NO,
BALL,
VEST
)values(
#{stadiumNo},
#{ball},
#{vest},
)
insert into MEMBER_PENALTY( MEM_NO, PN_CONTENT, PN_REPORTER, PN_TYPE ) values( #{memNo}, #{pnContent}, #{pnReporter}, 'MATCH' )

insert into STADIUM_IMG( STADIUM_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_TYPE )values
( #{attachment.stadiumNo}, #{attachment.originName}, #{attachment.changeName}, #{attachment.filePath}, #{attachment.fileType} )
mapper.select: select MEM_NO as memNo, MEM_EMAIL as memEmail, MEM_PWD as memPwd, MEM_NAME as memName, MEM_ADD as memAdd, MEM_GENDER as memGender, MEM_PHONE as memPhone, MEM_STATUS as memStatus, MEM_RANK as memRank, MEM_ENROLL_DATE as memEnrollDate, MEM_BIRTH as memBirth from member where MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail} and MEM_STATUS in('Y','M','A')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ADD, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_PHONE, MEM_STATUS) VALUES( #{memEmail}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memGender}, #{memAdd}, #{memBirth}, #{memPhone}, #{memStatus} )

INSERT into PROFILE_FILE(
mem_no,
team_no,
ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) values(
#{memNo},
#{teamNo},
#{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT MATCH S.MEM_NO AS memNo, S.RESERV_START AS reservStart, S.RESERV_END AS reservEnd FROM TEAM T JOIN MEM NO ON T.MEM_NO = S.TEAM_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STADIUM_REVIEW ( REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_STAR, STADIUM_NO, MEM_NO, REVIEW_DATE ) VALUES ( #{reviewContent}, #{reviewStar}, #{stadiumNo}, #{memNo}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT s.STADIUM_NO AS stadiumNo, s.MEM_NO AS memNo, s.STADIUM_NAME AS stadiumName, s.STADIUM_ADDRESS AS stadiumAdd, s.STADIUM_ZIPCODE AS stadiumZipcode, s.STADIUM_PRICE AS stadiumPrice, s.STADIUM_CATEGORY AS stadiumCategory, s.STADIUM_START_TIME AS stadiumStartTime, s.STADIUM_END_TIME AS stadiumEndTime, s.STATUS AS status, sa.TOILET AS toilet, sa.SHOWER AS shower, sa.SMOKE AS smoke, sa.PARK AS park, sa.DRINK AS drink, si.ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, si.CHANGE_NAME AS changeName, si.FILE_PATH AS filePath, si.STATUS AS imgStatus, si.FILE_TYPE AS fileType, sr.BALL AS ball, sr.VEST AS vest FROM STADIUM s LEFT JOIN STADIUM_AM sa ON s.STADIUM_NO = sa.STADIUM_NO LEFT JOIN STADIUM_IMG si ON s.STADIUM_NO = si.STADIUM_NO LEFT JOIN STADIUM_RENTAL sr ON s.STADIUM_NO = sr.STADIUM_NO WHERE s.MEM_NO = #{memNo} LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE STADIUM SET STADIUM_NAME = #{stadiumName}, STADIUM_ADDRESS = #{stadiumAdd}, STADIUM_ZIPCODE = #{stadiumZipcode}, STADIUM_PRICE = #{stadiumPrice}, STADIUM_CATEGORY = #{stadiumCategory}, STADIUM_START_TIME = #{stadiumStartTime}, STADIUM_END_TIME = #{stadiumEndTime} WHERE STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}
UPDATE STADIUM_AM SET TOILET = #{toilet}, SHOWER = #{shower}, SMOKE = #{smoke}, PARK = #{park}, DRINK = #{drink} WHERE STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}
mapper.select: SELECT si.STADIUM_NO AS stadiumNo, si.ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, si.CHANGE_NAME AS changeName, si.FILE_PATH AS filePath, si.FILE_TYPE AS fileType FROM STADIUM_IMG si WHERE si.STADIUM_NO = #{memNo} AND si.FILE_TYPE = 1

SELECT m.MATCH_NO AS matchNo, s.STADIUM_NAME AS stadiumName, si.FILE_PATH AS stadiumImage, a_team.TEAM_NAME AS aaTeamName, b_team.TEAM_NAME AS bbTeamName, m.RESERV_START AS reservStart, m.RESERV_END AS reservEnd FROM `MATCH` m INNER JOIN STADIUM s ON m.STADIUM_NO = s.STADIUM_NO LEFT JOIN STADIUM_IMG si ON s.STADIUM_NO = si.STADIUM_NO AND si.FILE_TYPE = 0 LEFT JOIN TEAM a_team ON m.TEAM_A_NO = a_team.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM b_team ON m.TEAM_B_NO = b_team.TEAM_NO WHERE m.MATCH_NO = #{matchNo};

SELECT m.MATCH_NO AS matchNo, s.STADIUM_NAME AS stadiumName, a_team_img.FILE_PATH AS aaTeamImage, b_team_img.FILE_PATH AS bbTeamImage, a_team.TEAM_NAME AS aaTeamName, b_team.TEAM_NAME AS bbTeamName, m.RESERV_START AS reservStart, m.RESERV_END AS reservEnd FROM `MATCH` m JOIN `STADIUM` s ON m.STADIUM_NO = s.STADIUM_NO JOIN `TEAM` a_team ON m.TEAM_A_NO = a_team.TEAM_NO JOIN `TEAM` b_team ON m.TEAM_B_NO = b_team.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN `TEAM_IMG` a_team_img ON a_team.TEAM_NO = a_team_img.TEAM_NO AND a_team_img.FILE_LEVER = '3' LEFT JOIN `TEAM_IMG` b_team_img ON b_team.TEAM_NO = b_team_img.TEAM_NO AND b_team_img.FILE_LEVER = '3' WHERE m.MATCH_NO = #{memNo} AND m.SCORE_A IS NULL AND m.SCORE_B IS NULL AND m.ACCESS_DATE > CURRENT_DATE

SELECT S.STADIUM_NO as stadiumNo, S.MEM_NO as memNo, S.STADIUM_NAME as stadiumName, S.STADIUM_ZIPCODE as stadiumZipcode, S.STADIUM_ADDRESS as stadiumAddress, S.STADIUM_SCORE as stadiumScore, S.STADIUM_PRICE as stadiumPrice, S.STADIUM_CATEGORY as stadiumCategory, S.STADIUM_START_TIME as stadiumStartTime, S.STADIUM_END_TIME as stadiumEndTime, S.STATUS as status, -- 물품 지원 R.BALL, R.VEST, -- 편의 시설 A.TOILET, A.SHOWER, A.SMOKE, A.PARK, A.DRINK FROM STADIUM S LEFT JOIN STADIUM_RENTAL R ON S.STADIUM_NO = R.STADIUM_NO LEFT JOIN STADIUM_AM A ON S.STADIUM_NO = A.STADIUM_NO WHERE S.STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}

SELECT SR.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, SR.STADIUM_NO AS stadiumNo, SR.MEM_NO AS memNo, M.MEM_NAME AS memName, SR.REVIEW_STAR AS reviewStar, SR.REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewContent, SR.REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate FROM STADIUM_REVIEW SR JOIN MEMBER M ON SR.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE SR.STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo} ORDER BY SR.REVIEW_DATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT TM.TEAM_NO AS teamNo, T.MEM_NO AS tmemNo, T.TEAM_NAME AS teamName, T.SCORE AS Score, T.TEAM_POINT AS teamPoint, TM.MEM_NO AS memNo, M.MEM_NAME AS memName, TM.STATUS AS Status, MIN(`MATCH`.MATCH_NO) AS matchNo, -- 첫 번째 MATCH_NO 선택 MIN(`MATCH`.RESERV_START) AS reservStart, -- 첫 번째 예약 시작 시간 MIN(`MATCH`.RESERV_END) AS reservEnd -- 첫 번째 예약 종료 시간 FROM TEAM_MEMBER TM JOIN TEAM T ON TM.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON TM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO LEFT JOIN `MATCH` ON T.TEAM_NO = `MATCH`.TEAM_A_NO WHERE T.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo} AND TM.STATUS = 'Y' AND (`MATCH`.TEAM_B_NO IS NULL OR `MATCH`.TEAM_B_NO = 0) GROUP BY TM.TEAM_NO, T.MEM_NO, T.TEAM_NAME, T.SCORE, T.TEAM_POINT, TM.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NAME, TM.STATUS;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STADIUM_QNA sq JOIN STADIUM s ON sq.STADIUM_NO = s.STADIUM_NO WHERE s.MEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT sq.MATCH_QNA_NO as matchQnaNo, sq.MATCH_Q_TITLE as matchQTitle, sq.MATCH_Q_DETAIL as matchQDetail, sq.MATCH_A as matchA, sq.MATCH_QNA_DATE as matchQnaDate FROM STADIUM_QNA sq JOIN STADIUM s ON sq.STADIUM_NO = s.STADIUM_NO WHERE s.MEM_NO = #{memNo} ORDER BY MATCH_QNA_NO DESC;

SELECT M.MATCH_NO AS matchNo, TA.TEAM_NAME AS aaTeamName, TB.TEAM_NAME AS bbTeamName, TIA.FILE_PATH AS aaTeamImage, TIB.FILE_PATH AS bbTeamImage, M.RESERV_START AS reservStart, M.RESERV_END AS reservEnd, M.ACCESS_DATE AS accessDate FROM `MATCH` M JOIN TEAM TA ON M.TEAM_A_NO = TA.TEAM_NO JOIN TEAM TB ON M.TEAM_B_NO = TB.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_IMG TIA ON TA.TEAM_NO = TIA.TEAM_NO AND TIA.FILE_LEVER = '3' LEFT JOIN TEAM_IMG TIB ON TB.TEAM_NO = TIB.TEAM_NO AND TIB.FILE_LEVER = '3' WHERE M.ACCESS_DATE < CURRENT_DATE AND (M.SCORE_A IS NULL OR M.SCORE_B IS NULL) AND M.STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}
SELECT mb.MEM_NO as memNo, mb.TEAM_NO as teamNo, m.MEM_NAME as memName FROM match_best mb JOIN `MEMBER` m ON mb.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE mb.MATCH_NO = #{matchNo} AND mb.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
